gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Ivotuk Flux and Climate Data (Excel) [Beringer, J.]
Ivotuk Flux and Climate Data (Excel) [Beringer, J.]

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: School of Geography and Environmental Science PO BOX 11A Clayton, Victoria, 3800

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: US Army Cold Regions Research and Engineering Laboratory (CRREL)

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: Cold Regions Research and Engineering Laboratory PO Box 35170
Water &amp; Env. Research Center University of Alaska, Fairbanks P.O. Box 755860
School of Geography and Environmental Science PO BOX 11A Clayton, Victoria, 3800

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: A single flux tower was constructed by Jason Beringer and operated during the snowmelt period at Ivotuk by Matt Sturm. Data processing and analysis was undertaken by Jason Beringer. Climate data were collected by Larry Hinzman. Sensible, latent and CO2 fluxes were measured along with net radiation from Larry Hinzman. NOTE: This dataset contains the data in Excel format.

gmd:deliveryPoint.gco:CharacterString: School of Geography and Environmental Science PO BOX 11A Clayton, Victoria, 3800
